stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes this ice after encountering it, if they did not break its printed subroutine with a decoder during that encounter, give them 1 tag. Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit.
text: Whenever the Runner passes this ice after encountering it, if they did not break its printed subroutine with a decoder during that encounter, give them 1 tag. [subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit].
title: Virtual Service Agent
